entry.string: There are #(1) articles matching these selection criteria at the moment
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a #(1) erteecles metcheeng zeese-a selecshun creeteria et zee mument

entry.string:
Some examples : (assuming your users have read access by default)

- In order to allow 'Friends' to submit News Articles (and only that), define a privilege 'SubmitNews' (or whatever name you prefer), and choose the publication type "News Articles" (instance 1:All:All:All) and access level "Submit (Comment)" above. Press "Finish and Apply to Privilege", and then assign that privilege to the 'Friends' role.

- In order to stop 'Strangers' from viewing Documents, define some privilege 'NoDocuments' with publication type "Documents" (instance 2:All:All:All) and access level "No Access". Then assign that privilege to the 'Strangers' role.

- ...
entry.translation:
Sume-a ixemples : (essoomeeng yuoor users hefe-a reed eccess by deffoolt)

- In oorder tu elloo 'Freeends' tu soobmeet Noos Erteecles (und oonly thet), deffeene-a a preefilege-a 'SoobmeetNoos' (oor vhetefer neme-a yuoo preffer), und chuuse-a zee poobleeceshun type-a "Noos Erteecles" (instunce-a 1:Ell:Ell:Ell) und eccess lefel "Soobmeet (Cumment)" ebufe-a. Press "Feenish und Epply tu Preefilege-a", und zeen esseegn thet preefilege-a tu zee 'Freeends' rule-a.

- In oorder tu stup 'Strungers' frum feeooing Ducooments, deffeene-a sume-a preefilege-a 'NuDucooments' veet poobleeceshun type-a "Ducooments" (instunce-a 2:Ell:Ell:Ell) und eccess lefel "Nu Eccess". Zeen esseegn thet preefilege-a tu zee 'Strungers' rule-a.

- ...
